attributes.action: Provide residential care funding for all elderly people without means testing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In England a portion of our taxes is channeled into the Scottish system to provide a minimum care fund for the elderly irrespective of savings or income. We demand that all UK taxpayers are treated equally. The current system only serves to benefit those people who have failed to provide for themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
